string.text: My back really hurts. I could use a nice warm artifact or two to soothe it. Could you bring me a few things?
Ahh, that's much better. Please take this for your trouble.

Nothing beats a cup of tea on a chilly autumn night. My friend Beard in the Skadovsk makes a special brew - I'll give you this complicated shotgun for some. I have my trusty hunting rifle and don't need anything else.

I do dearly miss the taste of smoked meats. I'll trade you this gun I found from a strange group of men in exchange for some salmon and sausage. I can't use this anyway, I've never seen these kinds of bullets in my life.
It's getting harder for me to fall asleep as an old man. Can you bring me some medicine? I'll give you this strange pistol that uses very small bullets.
